name: Tenney Mountain
description: Tenney Mountain Resort is home to some of the most exciting and challenging terrain in New England. With 1,500 vertical feet, epic tree skiing, perfectly groomed trails and a brand-new terrain park—accessible by a rope tow with lighting for evening riding—there’s something for every skier and rider. Tenney has been announced as a new resort addition for the 25/26 season. It is not available on Indy Pass for the 24/25 season.
